modName: Bloodskal Blade - Staff of Parthalan Re-envisioned
summary: Replaces the Bloodskal blade and visuals with the Staff of Parthalan from Dragon Age II. When the character power attacks instead of the red beam that normally shoots out, I replaced it with visuals from the fire breath shout.
descriptionHtml:
Requirements:
Skyrim v1.9.32.0.8
Dragonborn DLC

Description:
Replaces the Bloodskal blade model, texture and visuals with the Staff of Parthalan from Dragon Age II. When the character power attacks instead of the red beam that normally shoots out, I replaced it with visuals from the fire breath shout. I also edited Gratian's Journal to reflect the weapon accordingly. Watch the video for a better explanation.

Comes in 2 versions: 
Standard - No stats changed, just model, texture & visuals.
Damage - 21
Critical Damage - 8
Fireblast damage - 30

Legendary - Increased weapon damage and greatly increased fire blast damage.
Damage - 35
Citical damage - 16
Fireblast damage - 150

Important notes:
- You can only obtain this weapon through the quest "The Final Descent" in the Dragonborn DLC . Fireblast will NOT work if you use the console to obtain the weapon. 

- Tested both the Standard & Legendary versions during and after the quest "The Final Descent"     and found no inconsistencies. 

- Fire breath shout is not edited in any way, I just used the visuals associated with it.

- Checked and cleaned with TES5EDIT 3.0.3.1

Credits:
- Bethesda for making an awesome moddable game.
- Rand0mNumbers for being too kind and giving me permission to use his Staff of Parthalan model and   texture.
- My cat "Captain America" for his support.
author: Decius Argonath
